mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B WHERE B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND B.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
AND
B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
(B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO ASC) RNUM, B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CODE, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.READ_COUNT,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) LIKE_COUNT,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END BOARD_WRITE_DATE
FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND B.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
AND
B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
(B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')
ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT B.BOARD_NO) FROM "COMMENT" C JOIN "BOARD" B ON (C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) WHERE C.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND C.COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND
B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
(B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')

SELECT DISTINCT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CODE, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.READ_COUNT,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) LIKE_COUNT,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END BOARD_WRITE_DATE
FROM "COMMENT" C JOIN "BOARD" B ON (C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) JOIN "MEMBER" M ON (B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND C.COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND
B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
(B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')
ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_CODE, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_TITLE) AS BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(M.MEMBER_NICKNAME) AS MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.READ_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS LIKE_COUNT, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOARD_WRITE_DATE,
B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE AS ORIGINAL_DATE FROM "SCRAP" S JOIN "BOARD" B ON (S.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) JOIN "MEMBER" M ON (B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE S.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND
B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' (B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')
UNION ALL SELECT I.INFO_BOARD_NO AS BOARD_NO, 2 AS BOARD_CODE, TO_CHAR(I.PROGRM_NM) AS BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(I.NANMM_BY_NM) AS MEMBER_NICKNAME, 0 AS READ_COUNT, 0 AS LIKE_COUNT,
TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(I.NOTICE_BGN_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOARD_WRITE_DATE,
TO_DATE(I.NOTICE_BGN_DE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS ORIGINAL_DATE FROM "INFO_SCRAP" S JOIN "INFO_BOARD" I ON (S.INFO_BOARD_NO = I.INFO_BOARD_NO) WHERE S.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
AND
I.PROGRM_NM LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' I.PROGRM_CN LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' (I.PROGRM_NM LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR I.PROGRM_CN LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')
) ORDER BY ORIGINAL_DATE DESC
